title: Fred Anderson Kia and the Anderson Automotive Group recognized as one of the Best Places to Work
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Fred Anderson Kia 
RALEIGH, N.C., Sept. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- The Anderson Automotive Group, which is made up of a several car dealerships in North Carolina and South Carolina, including Fred Anderson Kia, was recently named one the Best Places to Work by the Triangle Business Journal . The Journal's Best Places to Work list consists of 50 different businesses in the Triangle-area with a wide range of companies being recognized. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150921/268782 
Fred Anderson Kia has long prided itself on being one of the best places work in Raleigh, N.C. and this most recent award simply confirms that. The dealership has a number of employees in its sales, service and other various positions, each of whom gladly participated in the Triangle Business Journal's survey to show their pride in working for the Anderson Automotive Group. 
By having the rankings based on feedback from these employee surveys, the list accurately reflects places in the Triangle where people actually enjoy working. The Anderson Automotive Group will be recognized on Sept. 25 at an awards event in Durham, N.C. Here the official rankings will be unveiled, as well as the top overall winners in each of the four business-size categories: small, medium, large and giant. 
Parties interested in learning more about the Triangle Business Journal's Best Places to Work list or are interested in a possible career with Fred Anderson Kia should contact the dealership by calling 919-747-3658 or view job openings on its website, www.kiaofraleigh.com . 
Media Contact: Jeff Simmons, Fred Anderson Kia, 919-825-3881, fakiaraleigh@anderson-auto.com
